org.apache.hadoop.hbase.hbtop.screen.top

Class TopScreenView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.hbtop.screen.AbstractScreenView
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.hbtop.screen.top.TopScreenView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScreenView

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class TopScreenView
extends AbstractScreenView
    The screen that provides a dynamic real-time view for the HBase metrics. This shows the metric Summary and the metric Records. The summary and the metrics are updated periodically (3 seconds by default).
